text.__SUMMARY__: Leccinum brunneobadium is a species of bolete fungus in the family Boletaceae. Found in Europe, it was originally described in 1970 by J. Blum as a species of Boletus. Lannoy and Estadès transferred it to the genus Leccinum in 1994.
